main event: A ground-radar observation of a fast-moving, irregular-shaped light object that appeared in the west and disappeared over the eastern horizon in about 2 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed to be moving at a speed 2-3 times faster than a commercial jet plane.
The object was estimated to be flying at an altitude of 30,000-40,000 feet.
The object was described as a white, triangular night-flying object.
There was a previous sighting of a similar type of object that was thought to be a satellite, which could be obscured and reappear.
The sighting was reported to the Pentagon's UFO research division for further investigation.
